snippet: Priceline Group jumped 5 percent after it reported profit and revenue that beat forecasts. First Solar also rose after a solid earnings report.
abstract: Stock market rises slightly, spurred by latest corporate results.
lead_paragraph: Priceline Group jumped 5 percent after it reported profit and revenue that beat forecasts. First Solar also rose after a solid earnings report.

headline.main: Wall St. Bolstered by Strong Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Market Reverses 3-Day Slump, as Earnings Top Glum Forecasts
